nomadTip.title: Nomad Tips
nomadTip.portugalVisa: In Portugal, the digital nomad visa allows a 1-year stay and is renewable.
nomadTip.thailandVisa: Thailand's digital nomad visa requires a minimum monthly income of $2,000.
nomadTip.lisbonWifi: Cafes in Lisbon generally have fast WiFi speeds, suitable for remote work.
nomadTip.chiangMaiCost: Chiang Mai's cost of living is 30% lower than Bangkok, but internet speed is slightly slower.
nomadTip.georgiaVisa: Georgia offers 1-year visa-free entry for most countries, perfect for nomads.
nomadTip.subscribeButton: Subscribe to email reminders ‚Üí Get visa expiry/city recommendations

addCity.question: How to add new cities?

reportBug.question: How to report errors?
reportBug.answer: Please use the contact form and select 'Bug Report' as the subject.

languages.question: What languages are supported?
languages.answer: Currently supports Chinese, English, Spanish and Japanese, with more languages in development.
